description: Sets the color and brightness of a specific LED strip segment.

segmentName.description: The LED strip segment to control. Use 'all' to apply settings to all segments.

rgbColourCode.description: The RGB color code to set as value like [255,0,0(list)]

brightnessValue.description: Brightness level to be set. map the brightness value to 0-255(8bit) from 0-100% and pass in brightnessValue argument.

examples: set ceiling to red at full brightness
set front almary to blue with half brightness
set all to white at max brightness
set behind the money plant to green and brightness 200
